title: On Art by Marsden Hartley (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
Horizon Press | 1982 | Pdf | Eng | 327 pag | 0818001313 | 47.1 MB

The prophetic insights of creative figures in Marsden Hartley's time have in our day been confirmed. Gertrude Stein called him: ".. genuinely transcendent. ...He deals with his color as actually as Picasso deals with his forms." William Carlos Williams: "[After World V/ar I] Hartley's genius was beginning to be recognized.... One of our finest painters." Kenneth Rexroth: "... his influence was moral and spiritual . . . the true magnanimity which belongs only to the great."
